#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        char s1[10001],s2[10001];
        cin >> s1 >> s2;
        if ( strlen(s1)!= strlen(s2))
        {
            cout << "NO\n";
        }
        else {
            int flag =0;
            sort(s1,s1+strlen(s1));
            sort(s2,s2+strlen(s2));

            for ( int i =0;i<strlen(s1);i++)
            {
                if ( s1[i] != s2[i])
                {
                    flag =1;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if ( flag == 1)
            {
                cout << "NO\n";
            }
            else
            {
                cout << "YES\n";
            }
        }

    }
}
